# Lists

* unordered list
    + sub-item 1
    + sub-item 2
        - sub-sub-item 1
        
*   item 2

    Continued (indent 4 spaces)
    
    
1. ordered list
2. item 2
    i) sub-item 1
         A.  sub-sub-item 1
         
(@)  A list whose numbering

continues after

(@)  an interruption

# Source Code

Use ``` to delimit blocks of source code:

```
code
```

Add a language to syntax highlight code blocks:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

```{r}
cars
```

```{r}
plot(cars)
```
